languages.text:
Servo Skull has +10 Fellowship.
At the beggining of Overseer's turn, all enemies adjacent to servoskull succeed at Willpower (+20) test or gain {g|f:8f4a66a1c9674e2b9016f79cc73f58a6}Perplexed{/g}. Servoskull gains +1 deflection for each {g|f:8f4a66a1c9674e2b9016f79cc73f58a6}Perplexed{/g} enemy in its relaying area

traits.locale_text:
Servo Skull has +10 Fellowship.
At the beggining of Overseer's turn, all enemies adjacent to servoskull succeed at Willpower (+20) test or gain {g|f:8f4a66a1c9674e2b9016f79cc73f58a6}Perplexed{/g}. Servoskull gains +1 deflection for each {g|f:8f4a66a1c9674e2b9016f79cc73f58a6}Perplexed{/g} enemy in its relaying area

languages.text:
The servo-skull swarm gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.
At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, enemies adjacent to the servo-skull swarm must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}. The servo-skull swarm's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is increased by +1 for each perplexed enemy in a 4-cell radius.
languages.original_text:
Рой сервочерепов получает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}.
В начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзирателя{/g} противники на соседних с роем клетках выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} с бонусом +20 и в случае провала получают +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательства{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Отражение{/g} роя увеличивается на 1 за каждого врага в замешательстве в радиусе 4 клеток.

traits.locale_text:
The servo-skull swarm gains +10 Fellowship.
At the start of the Overseer's turn, enemies adjacent to the servo-skull swarm must pass a Willpower resistance test with a +20 bonus or suffer +1 stack of perplexed. The servo-skull swarm has its deflection increased by +1 for each perplexed enemy in a 4-cell radius.

The servo-skull swarm gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.
At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, enemies adjacent to the servo-skull swarm must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}. The servo-skull swarm's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is increased by +1 for each perplexed enemy in a 4-cell radius.

The servo-skull swarm gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.
At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, enemies adjacent to the servo-skull swarm must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}. The servo-skull swarm's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is increased by +1 for each perplexed enemy in a 4-cell radius.

languages.text:
Hizmelet sürüsü, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} niteliği kazanır.
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}'in {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} başladığında hizmelet sürüsünün bitişiğindeki düşmanlar, +20 bonusa sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde +1 {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}şaşkınlık{/g} birikimine maruz kalırlar. Hizmelet sürüsünün {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değeri, 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan her şaşkın düşman için +1 artar.
languages.original_text:
The servo-skull swarm gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.
At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, enemies adjacent to the servo-skull swarm must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}. The servo-skull swarm's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is increased by +1 for each perplexed enemy in a 4-cell radius.

traits.locale_text:
Hizmelet sürüsü, +10 Sosyallik niteliği kazanır.
Gözetmen'in turu başladığında hizmelet sürüsünün bitişiğindeki düşmanlar, +20 bonusa sahip bir İrade direnç testinden geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde +1 şaşkınlık birikimine maruz kalırlar. Hizmelet sürüsünün saptırma değeri, 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan her şaşkın düşman için +1 artar.

Hizmelet sürüsü, +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sosyallik{/g} niteliği kazanır.
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Gözetmen{/g}'in {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} başladığında hizmelet sürüsünün bitişiğindeki düşmanlar, +20 bonusa sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde +1 şaşkınlık birikimine maruz kalırlar. Hizmelet sürüsünün {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}saptırma{/g} değeri, 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan her şaşkın düşman için +1 artar.

languages.text:
El enjambre de servocráneos recibe +10 de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Empatía{/g}.
Al comienzo del {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}supervisor{/g}, los enemigos adyacentes al enjambre de servocráneos deben superar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una bonificación de +20 para no sufrir +1 acumulación del efecto {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplejo{/g}. El {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}desvío{/g} del enjambre de servocráneos aumenta en +1 por cada enemigo perplejo que haya en un radio de 4 casillas.
languages.original_text:
The servo-skull swarm gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.
At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, enemies adjacent to the servo-skull swarm must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}. The servo-skull swarm's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is increased by +1 for each perplexed enemy in a 4-cell radius.

traits.locale_text:
El enjambre de servocráneos recibe +10 de Empatía.
Al comienzo del turno del supervisor, los enemigos adyacentes al enjambre de servocráneos deben superar una prueba de fortaleza de Voluntad con una bonificación de +20 para no sufrir +1 acumulación del efecto perplejo. El desvío del enjambre de servocráneos aumenta en +1 por cada enemigo perplejo que haya en un radio de 4 casillas.

languages.text:
伺服头骨集群的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}社交{/g}提高10点。
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}监察官{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，所有与伺服头骨集群相邻的敌人都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中获得+20加值。若未能通过检定，则会获得1层困惑效果。距离伺服头骨集群距离4格以内，每有一名处于{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}困惑{/g}效果的敌人，伺服头骨集群的{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}偏转{/g}就提高1点。
languages.original_text:
The servo-skull swarm gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.
At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, enemies adjacent to the servo-skull swarm must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}. The servo-skull swarm's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is increased by +1 for each perplexed enemy in a 4-cell radius.

traits.locale_text:
伺服头骨集群的社交提高10点。
监察官的回合开始时，所有与伺服头骨集群相邻的敌人都需要进行意志抗性检定，且在此次检定中获得+20加值。若未能通过检定，则会获得1层困惑效果。距离伺服头骨集群距离4格以内，每有一名处于困惑效果的敌人，伺服头骨集群的偏转就提高1点。

languages.text:
Der Servoschädel-Schwarm erhält +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Gefolgschaft{/g}.
Zu Beginn des {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zugs{/g} des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Aufsehers{/g} müssen an den Servoschädel-Schwarm angrenzende Gegner eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} mit einem Bonus von +20 bestehen, sonst erhalten sie +1 Stapel {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Überrascht{/g}. Die {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Ablenkung{/g} des Servoschädel-Schwarms wird für jeden überraschten Gegner in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um +1 erhöht.
languages.original_text:
The servo-skull swarm gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.
At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, enemies adjacent to the servo-skull swarm must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}. The servo-skull swarm's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is increased by +1 for each perplexed enemy in a 4-cell radius.

traits.locale_text:
Der Servoschädel-Schwarm erhält +10 Gefolgschaft.
Zu Beginn des Zugs des Aufsehers müssen an den Servoschädel-Schwarm angrenzende Gegner eine Widerstandsprobe auf Willenskraft mit einem Bonus von +20 bestehen, sonst erhalten sie +1 Stapel Überrascht. Die Deflektion des Servoschädel-Schwarms wird für jeden überraschten Gegner in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um +1 erhöht.

languages.text:
L'essaim de servocrânes reçoit un bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Sociabilité{/g} de +10.
Au début du {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}surveillant{/g}, les ennemis adjacents à l'essaim de servocrânes doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} avec un bonus de +20. En cas d'échec, ils subissent 1 cumul de l'effet {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}Perplexité{/g}. La {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Déflexion{/g} de l'essaim de servocrânes est augmentée de +1 pour chaque ennemi sous l'effet Perplexité dans un rayon de 4 cases.
languages.original_text:
The servo-skull swarm gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.
At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, enemies adjacent to the servo-skull swarm must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}. The servo-skull swarm's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is increased by +1 for each perplexed enemy in a 4-cell radius.

traits.locale_text:
L'essaim de servocrânes reçoit un bonus de Sociabilité de +10.
Au début du tour du surveillant, les ennemis adjacents à l'essaim de servocrânes doivent réussir un test de résistance de Force mentale avec un bonus de +20. En cas d'échec, ils subissent 1 cumul de l'effet Perplexité. La Déflexion de l'essaim de servocrânes est augmentée de +1 pour chaque ennemi sous l'effet Perplexité dans un rayon de 4 cases.

languages.text:
サーヴォスカルスウォームの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}連帯{/g}が+10される。
{g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}監督者{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、サーヴォスカルスウォームに隣接する敵は+20のボーナスで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならず、失敗すると+1スタックの{g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}混乱{/g}を受ける。サーヴォスカルスウォームの{g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}ディフレクション{/g}は半径4セルの混乱した敵につき+1増加する。
languages.original_text:
The servo-skull swarm gains +10 {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Fellowship{/g}.
At the start of the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}Overseer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, enemies adjacent to the servo-skull swarm must pass a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a +20 bonus or suffer +1 stack of {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}perplexed{/g}. The servo-skull swarm's {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}deflection{/g} is increased by +1 for each perplexed enemy in a 4-cell radius.

traits.locale_text:
サーヴォスカルスウォームの連帯が+10される。
監督者のターン開始時、サーヴォスカルスウォームに隣接する敵は+20のボーナスで意志力抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると+1スタックの混乱を受ける。サーヴォスカルスウォームのディフレクションは半径4セルの混乱した敵につき+1増加する。

サーヴォスカルスウォームの連帯が+10される。
監督者のターン開始時、サーヴォスカルスウォームに隣接する敵は+20のボーナスで意志力抵抗判定を受けなければならず、失敗すると+1スタックの混乱を受ける。サーヴォスカルスウォームのディフレクションは半径4セルの混乱した敵につき+1増加する。

Рой сервочерепов получает +10 к {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerFellowship}Общительности{/g}.
В начале {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerOverseerGlossary}надзирателя{/g} противники на соседних с роем клетках выполняют проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} с бонусом +20 и в случае провала получают +1 уровень {g|Encyclopedia:PerplexedEffect}замешательства{/g}. {g|Encyclopedia:Deflection}Отражение{/g} роя увеличивается на 1 за каждого врага в замешательстве в радиусе 4 клеток.

traits.locale_text:
Рой сервочерепов получает +10 к Общительности.
В начале хода надзирателя противники на соседних с роем клетках выполняют проверку Воли на сопротивление с бонусом +20 и в случае провала получают +1 уровень замешательства. Отражение роя увеличивается на 1 за каждого врага в замешательстве в радиусе 4 клеток.

Рой сервочерепов получает +10 к Общительности.
В начале хода надзирателя противники на соседних с роем клетках выполняют проверку Воли на сопротивление с бонусом +20 и в случае провала получают +1 уровень замешательства. Отражение роя увеличивается на 1 за каждого врага в замешательстве в радиусе 4 клеток.
